channel.title: Domain Entity on REAL Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Domain Entity on REAL Documentation

item.title: Getters
item.description: Entities have two getter methods for every attribute field: <ValueType> get<attributeName>(): returns a DomainValue <primitive-value> get<attributeName>Value(): returns the underlying Java value one getter method for relation fields: <DomainEntity> get<relationName>(): returns a DomainEntity and one generic getFieldValue("<fieldName>") method in order to retreive field values by name. The returned types for getters are as follows: ValueType final get<fieldName>() @Override get<fieldName>Value() Nullable DomainBoolean ValueType Boolean No DomainDate ValueType LocalDate Yes DomainDateTime ValueType LocalDateTime Yes DomainDecimal ValueType BigDecimal No DomainEnumerate Enum String (code) No DomainInteger ValueType Integer No DomainLong ValueType Long No DomainString ValueType String No DomainText ValueType String Yes DomainTime ValueType LocalTime Yes DomainRelation DomainEntity undefined Yes For relation-fields the method getFieldValue(final String fieldName) returns a DomainEntity.

item.title: Setters
item.description: Entities have two setter methods for every attribute field: set<attributeName>(<ValueType>): sets a DomainValue set<attributeName>Value(<primitive-value>): sets the underlying Java value one setter method for relation fields: set<relationName>(<DomainEntity> ): sets a DomainEntity and one generic setFieldValue("<fieldName>") method in order to set field values by name. The value-parameter types for setters are as follows: ValueType @Override set<fieldName>(...) final set<fieldName>Value(..) Nullable DomainBoolean ValueType Boolean No DomainDate ValueType LocalDate Yes DomainDateTime ValueType LocalDateTime Yes DomainDecimal ValueType BigDecimal No DomainEnumerate Enum String (code) No DomainInteger ValueType Integer No DomainLong ValueType Long No DomainString ValueType String No DomainText ValueType String Yes DomainTime ValueType LocalTime Yes DomainRelation DomainEntity undefined Yes For relation-fields the method setFieldValue(final String fieldName, Object value) expects a DomainEntity value.

item.title: Additional Methods
item.description: Entities have the following extra methods: Method Description MEntity getEntityMeta() return entity Meta data EntityKey getEntityKey() return surrogate-key wrapper class EntityVersion getEntityVersion() return optimistic-locking version number BusinessKey getBusinessKey() return a serializable representation of the entity business key boolean isReadOnly(final String fieldName) if returned ‘true’ the field setter will generate an exception boolean isMandatory(final String fieldName) if returned ‘true’ the field setter will not accept a Null value.
